name: Detect Object
text: Name an object. For the duration of the ritual’s effect, you can detect the direction and distance to the nearest example of that object, as long as one is within the range defined by your Arcana check result. When attempting to locate a specific object, apply the modifiers below.
flavorText: Lifting your finger, you point confidently at a blank stone wall. Twenty feet past it, you can sense the prince’s stolen scepter.
